channel.title: Gateway can't reconnect after HOST suspend/resume
channel.description:
This happens on three different systems with different flavors Linux. After the host suspends and then resumes, the Gateway won't reconnect to TOR no matter what I do (restart tor, restart firewall) I have to POWER OFF the Gateway and restart the VM (restarting from withing VM doesn't work).
Is this expected behavior. Any way to avoid?

item.title: Gateway can't reconnect after HOST suspend/resume
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi scublr

Using suspend / resume… is recommended against due to issues much like you are experiencing.

https://whonix.org/wiki/Post_Install_Advice#Network_Time_Syncing
